turns.text: What are you guys having for Christmas

turns.text: What are we having Lets see Well Im not planning the menu

turns.text: Oh youre not
turns.label: bh

turns.label: nn

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- but um I dont know it seems like big thing for Christmas is usually ham
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well funny you should mention that Im pig farmer
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh you are --
turns.label: bh

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: ny

turns.text: -- huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: Well now its kind of hobby more than anything else but were going to have uh wild boar --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: My goodness
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- we uh we killed boar the other day it was you know mating with the sows and you cant use the piglets you know so -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: Its about six months of no use so we uh we shot him and cleaned him out and had him you know processed into ham and uh were also going to have little roast suckling pig because I Ive got one thats got hernia --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh really
turns.label: bh

turns.text: -- and rather than you know pay the vet four hundred dollars for surgery well just cook him and eat him
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Is that is that hard
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Well no hey I tell you what preparing little pig is is snap Im telling you real easy easier than chicken
turns.label: nn

turns.text: Oh really
turns.label: bh

turns.text: Yeah you just uh - you kill him you know you probably - most guys just shoot them in the head they go you know - in second theyre gone --
turns.label: ny

turns.text: Oh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and then you just dip the carcass in uh boiling water pull it out and theres we use little raspy brush pulls the hair off and uh gut it and uh just stick it down in pit with some cloves and uh some pineapple about three pineapples you know sliced them up and uh cover him up with uh wet uh sacks feed sacks is what I usually use -- more than one utt
turns.label: sd*

turns.text: Huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and then start charcoal fire on top of him
Oh my goodness
turns.label: ba

turns.text: And after about six hours you put the fire out and dig that baby out of there and its the best eating you ever had
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh well does boar taste just like regular ham

turns.text: Huh

turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh my
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- and he dressed out to almost two hundred and ten pounds
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh my goodness
turns.label: ba

turns.text: Well you know we took the skin and the head and the le- and the feet off and that was about you know hundred hundred pounds of just ham
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh well how many people are you planning on serving at Christmas
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Oh well were you know were not going to eat the whole thing
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Eat it all yeah
turns.label: b^m

turns.text: It would take year But uh you know were going to drive up to Kansas City see my wifes folks and uh she she - whats whats whats your mother cooking for Christmas yeah well her moms doing brisket
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I dont - what is brisket
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Brisket Its part of the cow that they used to throw away
turns.label: bh^m

turns.text: Huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: Its just tough as boot --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and uh you know they used to use it for leather I think
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh my goodness
turns.label: ba

turns.text: I mean no I was kidding
turns.label: ar

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.text: But uh its its part of the loin you know the rib cage and it has lot of muscle in it and lot of gristle where it attaches to the ribs so its really really tough piece of meat --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh my goodness
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- but its so tasty you cant stand it
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: And that softens it up huh

turns.label: b

turns.label: sd

turns.text: Oh gee
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- and at night it goes down to about sixty
turns.label: sd
